channel.title: Item requirements
channel.description:
hello, this is latin king.
I need just one favor from you guys, please if you know tell me.
ok, i need to make item requirements for one of my items, but how do i do that? i mean like, you need a certain skill to use it. like a skillcape.
please post here if you know how to do it :( THANK YOU!

item.title: Item requirements
item.dc:creator: @latin_king latin king
item.description:
@latin_king wrote:

still dont get it dude, what does client class have to do? what i need to do?

Read full topic

item.title: Item requirements
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you are using DeltaScape: Wearing class.

If you are using a non-Delta source: client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Item requirements
item.dc:creator: @waffle1 waffle`
item.description:
@waffle1 wrote:

Well I don’t really understand what you want to use it for, or what you want your requirements to be.

You could do something like

else if(playerLevel[5] >= 99)

For a level requirement, the [5] is the skill number, and the 99 is the level, I don’t know ALL the skill numbers lol sorry.

For item requirements try this -

if(playerHasItemAmount(####, ##)

So a full code could look something like this,

if (command.startsWith("blah")) { if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 100) teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; }

I think that would work, not entirely sure haha.

You have to edit the return # to, or it won’t work.

Read full topic
